name: Corinna Couture Anniversary dress
description:
Gorgeous stripwork dress with little ruffles and elegant trim celebrating 5 years of Corinna couture creations. Very limited. Bodice is chambray blue. Sash will be your choice of fabric:
pink/purple bird 
Mustard circles
blue feathers
blue henna circles
Green trees
purple botanical
navy  with purple flower (trim)
OR
blue chambray same fabric as bodice.

name: The Seraphina dress
description:
Beautiful navy bodice and Gorgeous fabrics are tied together with a bright sash. Bodice is elasticized. Short sleeve available

***Model is wearing a pettiskirt (to show the skirt twirlability) which is not included or sold by me.

Necklace: aikoart
Hair piece:chickapee creations 
Pettiskirt: huggalugs

name: The Desiray dress
description:
This is an addition to the Belle collection. Gorgeous oranges and blue with splashes of olive in tiered patchwork. Choice of orange or blue bodice. Sash included

SLEEVES can be made long sleeve if you prefer! Model is wearing pettiskirt (to show twirl-ability) which is NOT included or sold by me

Hair piece: appelilly couture
Pettiskirt: huggalugs
Photography by 3rd floor studio

name: The Emma dress
description:
The Emma dress is back and better than ever! This is a revamp of its most popular predecessor with even more fabrics from the original collection. Gorgeous oranges and blue with splashes of olive. Choice of orange or blue bodice. Beautiful trim and ruffles on the patchwork.

SLEEVES can be made short sleeve if you prefer! Bodice available in blue or orange

Necklace by Aikoart 
Hair piece by chickapee creations 
Pettiskirt: huggaluggs
Boots : Gap

name: The Sugar Plum dress
description:
This contemporary dress will get your lil gal noticed this holiday season. Can be worn all winter long!
This peasant dress features a long sleeve bodice and beautiful red, teal blue, pink and white stripwork. A perfectly coordinating sash tie together the floral, trees, birds and foliage.

SLEEVES can be made short sleeve if you prefer! Bodice available in pink or teal

Coordinating leggings sold separately in my shop.

***Model is wearing a pettiskirt (to show the skirt twirlability) which is not included or sold by me.

Necklace by Aikoart 
Hair piece by chickapee creations
Pettiskirt: http://www.huggalugs.com/flutter-pettiskirts.html

name: The Alexandria dress
description:
This classic dress will get your lil gal noticed this holiday season. Can be worn all winter long!
This peasant dress features a long sleeve bodice and beautiful red, green,black and white stripwork. A perfectly coordinating sash and trim tie together the floral, berries, birds and foliage. Gorgeous (optional) lace underskirt.

SLEEVES can be made short sleeve if you prefer! Bodice available red (as pictured), green or black.

Ruffled lace underskirt is ruffled lace on a cotton voile skirt and is sewn on to the bodice.

This listing is for the dress WITH the underskirt ($12-$15) included in the price. If you would like just the stripwork dress w/o underskirt($60) , pls choose the option that says dress only 

Lace is machine washable however, DO NOT iron

***Model is wearing a pettiskirt (to show the skirt twirlability) which is not included or sold by me.

Necklace: by Aikoart 
Hair piece: by chickapee creations
Pettiskirt: http://www.huggalugs.com/flutter-pettiskirts.html

name: The Evie Grace dress
description:
This contemporary dress will get your lil gal noticed this holiday season. Can be worn all winter long!
This peasant dress features a long sleeve bodice and beautiful red, mint blue, grey and white patchwork in my original "Luna" style. A perfectly coordinating sash ties together the floral, berries, birds and foliage. Gorgeous lace adorns the trim.

SLEEVES can be made short sleeve if you prefer! Bodice available in grey, red or blue. Pls make a note of bodice color change or sleeve length at checkout

Lace is machine washable however, DO NOT iron

***Model is wearing a pettiskirt (to show the skirt twirlability) which is not included or sold by me.

Please see my store policies for care instructions, sizing information, current turnaround times and other info

Hair piece by appelilly couture
Pettiskirt: http://www.huggalugs.com/flutter-pettiskirts.html

name: The Holly Jollie dress
description:
This contemporary dress will get your lil gal noticed this Christmas season and be perfect for Christmas card pictures and parties!
This peasant dress features a 3/4 bell sleeve and beautiful red, green, mint blue and white spiral patchwork. A perfectly coordinating sash and trim tie together the floral, ornaments, snowflakes and dots.

SLEEVES can be made short sleeve if you prefer! Bodice available in blue, red or green. Pls leave a note at checkout if you'd like a different sleeve length or bodice color.

Coordinating leggings sold separately in my shop

***Model is wearing a pettiskirt (to show the skirt twirlability) which is not included or sold by me.

Please see my store policies for care instructions, sizing information, current turnaround times and other info

name: The Viola Dress
description:
This is one of my favorite color combinations. This is from several different fabric lines that play so nice together!! 
This peasant dress features a short sleeved bodice in the PERFECT shade of berry/plum and beautiful tiered patchwork in aquas and purples with splashes of pink. Lavender sash is included.
You can find the m2m necklace here:
http://www.etsy.com/listing/81300423/m2m-corinna-couture-viola-chunky

**** MY CURRENT TURNAROUND TIME IS 4-5 WEEKS****Please note this when ordering..... I also can not accept any custom work at this time. Thank you for understanding!
 
Sizes 6mon to 6yrs are made to order. A size 7 or 8 can be made for an additional fee. Please note the size in the "notes to seller" section upon checkout.

Here is my sizing chart: shoulder to hem
BELOW the knee length is:

6M: 16"
6-12M: 17"
12M: 17-18"
12-18M: 18-19"
18-24M: 19-20"
2t: 20-21"
3t: 22-23"
4t: 24-25"
5t: 26-27" 
6: 27-28"


Special Thanks to Landojake Photography for the beautiful photos.
